title: E field - E is zero midway between 2 point charges

content.question: Which of the following statements about the charges of the objects must be true?

choices.label: The charges are equal in magnitude but opposite in sign.
The charges are equal in magnitude and have the same sign.
The charges are not necessarily equal in magnitude but have opposite signs.
The charges are not necessarily equal in magnitude but have the same sign.

content.answer: The charges are equal in magnitude and have the same sign.

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
